thread.title: You'll be amazed by how far Pekovic throws a medicine ball (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: You'll be amazed by how far Pekovic throws a medicine ball (VIDEO)

title: You'll be amazed by how far Pekovic throws a medicine ball (VIDEO)
text:
1:44p ET 
It's pretty tough to throw a basketball from the court into the 15th row of an arena. Now, just imagine how tough that would be if you replaced it with a medicine ball. 
Impossible, right? Well, unless you happen to be resident strongman Nikola Pekovic . 
From the Timberwolves' official Instagram account: true A video posted by Minnesota Timberwolves (@timberwolves) on Oct 12, 2015 at 10:03am PDT 
That's it. It's time we see Pek and Mr. Incredible fight it out just so we can see if Pekovic is capable of wrecking a fictional superhero. My money's on Pek.
